content: work one single_crochet row in your first color change colors and work a second single_crochet row in the new color this gives a very clean transition pattern with color a round 1 fhdc 100 slip_stitch into 1st fhdc to join into a circle be careful not to twist the loop or chain 100 slip_stitch into 1st chain to join into a circle be careful not to twist the loop then chain 2 and half_double_crochet around slip_stitch into 1st half_double_crochet to join round 2 chain 2 *skip join st and first 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet into 1st skip st double_crochet into 2nd skip st* around until 3 sts remain skip 2 double_crochet into last double_crochet double_crochet into join stitch from previous round double_crochet into 1st skip st double_crochet into 2nd skip st slip_stitch into turning chain to join 100 double_crochet round 3 chain 1 single_crochet around slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet to join 100 single_crochet rounds 4-11 repeat row 2 and 3 four more times change to color b row 12 chain 1 single_crochet around slip_stitch into chain 1 to join 100 single_crochet mountain pass cowl - march 2021 4 row 13 chain 2 *skip join st and first 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet into 1st skip st double_crochet into 2nd skip st* around until 3 sts remain skip 2 double_crochet into last double_crochet double_crochet into join stitch from previous round double_crochet into 1st skip st double_crochet into 2nd skip st slip_stitch into turning chain to join 100 double_crochet row 14 chain 1 single_crochet around slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet to join 100 single_crochet row 15- 22 repeat row 13 and 14 four more times change to color c row 23 chain 1 single_crochet around slip_stitch into chain 1 to join 100 single_crochet row 24 chain 2 *skip join st and first 2 sts double_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet into 1st skip st double_crochet into 2nd skip st* around until 3 sts remain skip 2 double_crochet into last double_crochet double_crochet into join stitch from previous round double_crochet into 1st skip st double_crochet into 2nd skip st slip_stitch into turning chain to join 100 double_crochet row 25 chain 1 single_crochet around slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet to join 100 single_crochet row 26-31 repeat row 24 and 25 three more times row 32 repeat row 24 row 33 chain 2 half_double_crochet around slip_stitch into 1st half_double_crochet to join fasten_off weave in your ends ***block your cowl using wet blocking my preference or steam blocking to help the lace open up and the stitches to lay smoothly *** enjoy your new cowl mountain pass cowl - march 2021 5 thank you so much for making my pattern please tag me @taralovescrochet on instagram and use the hashtags #mountainpasscowl and #taralovescrochet visit my instagram page here https //www instagram com/taralovescrochet/ for more patterns check out my ravelry store https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/tara-briggs- ravelry-store _________________________________________________ here are some photos from my amazing testers check them out on instagram too @thethoughtfulartisan @hookedandsewn
